channel.title: Rocket on Øyvind Monsen
channel.description: Recent content in Rocket on Øyvind Monsen

item.title: Create a Rust Rest Api With Rocket
item.description: This article will be going over how to make a very simple REST API with Rust and the Rocket library. Since Rust is more of a low level language you would seldom use it for such a simple example, but it fits the purpouse of focusing on just the web part of this. Project setup First of all we need to setup a project with cargo: cargo new simple-rest --bin cd simple-rest Now we need some dpendencies, namely Rocket.
